page.title: 07SW BASINGSTOKE: LAW/ORDER 2
page.content: The Community policeman is involved in enforcing law and order and also in the social life of the community. As well as enforcing law and order and attending to domestic disturbances and complaints about noise, he or she will attend meetings outside working hours e.g. Residents' Associations. Contacts are maintained with schools, where the Community Policeman may be involved in talking to the children about road safety or the dangers of talking to strangers. Crime on the estate in the north is quite high and is characterised by vandalism and petty theft.
